overview: 'Shunyata' means emptiness.This film reflects the stream of consciousness as a continuous flow of change and transformation.  Shunyata is created by layering, constructing, and deconstructing 16mm film footage and analogue wave forms into an immersive, sense-transcending experience, one that through constant change and chaos evokes a sense of deep meditation and timelessness. A white cloud fades in the empty sky.
title: Shunyata
